meta.job_title: SAP S/4HANA Data Design Lead - Order & Distribution to Cash

duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate on all business data requirements within the S/4 HANA design process.
Define and document the S/4 Enterprise Data Standards and ensure that existing SAP ECC data is fit for purpose at the point of migration to S/4 HANA.
Drive out the data designs for all relevant data objects and customizations in the O&DTC space.
Lead the definition, documentation, and implementation of S/4 Enterprise Data standards related to the Material Master, including master data, reference data, and metadata.

Assist in the development of the S/4 Data Quality Strategy and secure its execution through the steering and agreeing the data quality approach for data within O&DTC EPO area enabling simplified migration, interim state, and the ongoing management of data to ensure that it remains fit for purpose post deployment.
Provide support to project data migration processes, including the coordination of pre and post load business sign off.
Assist the S/4 Data Governance team in the creation of effective global procedures to ensure that each data asset is governed throughout its lifecycle.

education_certification.credential: Qualified Accountant with significant experience and subject matter expertise in Order & Distribution to Cash (O&DTC) processes and related data concepts.
Demonstrable SAP working knowledge across transactions and reporting in an SAP environment.
Experience of Business/IT partnering for the implementation of Data Governance-related solutions.
Demonstrated ability to lead in a diverse, global team, within and across functions. Experience with global working and across cultures.
